about_the_game:
In this demo you will have access to a limited part of the original game. Description of the original game:
Play with well-known historical characters from different eras and countries, such as Leonardo da Vinci, Albert Einstein, and many others! There's a common enemy traveling through time and causing mayhem. They need to gather strength in this game with simple and fun visuals but challenging mechanics, can you defeat the threat? This platformer has a lot of unusual obstacles and bosses for you to overcome and achieve victory.

Jump, dash and climb to overcome the challenges, each character has a unique ability for a more varied gameplay and as you progress, new concepts will emerge. In the boss levels, attack and dodge with your dash until you finally defeat him, if you're not satisfied, defeat him again in the insane mode for the most experienced only. Some scenes may contain some secrets, so pay close attention.

name: Histo-Time Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10, 11 (32 bits e 64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 ou equivalente
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Help your favorite historical characters from different eras and places face challenging levels and obstacles, including epic boss battles. Who is behind all this confusion? Find out in this demo what they are capable of doing to save the world.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil
